name: Virun
description:
In the midst of a deadly pandemic, a lone soul must maintain distance, and restore the natural order of cleanliness.

This is my first game released which I made for an A-Level project at school. It has been created with the intention of educating children on the importance of health through gamification.

The project is considered complete, however this is a functional final prototype rather than a fully fledged game. The prototype has been rigorously tested and is 100% playable. 

The project was done in Unity 3D, however is played in 2D.

Art, Code, Animation, and Design by me.

SFX by Joe Lamb and Mike Koenig on SoundBible

Music by HeatleyBros
